# textDragInteraction

**Instance Property**

The drag interaction object added by UIKit to the text view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var textDragInteraction: UIDragInteraction? { get }
```

## Discussion

You can set the text drag interaction’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDragInteraction/isEnabled] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if you need to explicitly turn off drag interactions for a UIKit-provided text view.
title: textDragInteraction
